title: Kawaii Joushi wo Komarasetai
original_name: 可愛い上司を困らせたい
sinopse: After drinking too much at a company party, the serious and shy 30-something Ira Megumi finds herself waking up naked in bed next to a younger coworker, Aoki Shun. What happened with Aoki the previous night? And perhaps more importantly, what does she want to happen with Aoki in the future?
